properties.description: The Microsoft Sentinel Triage assistance is an automation toolkit to simplify the construction of automation to analyze Sentinel Incidents (version 0.2.3)

info.title: STAT
info.description: The Microsoft Sentinel Triage assistance is an automation toolkit to simplify the construction of automation to analyze Sentinel Incidents (version 0.2.3)

post.description: Sentinel Triage AssistanT Base Module enriches entities in the Sentinel Incidient to provide additional data for analysis

AddAccountComments.description: Enrich Incident with Account details comment

AddIPComments.description: Enrich Incident with IP details comment

additionalData.description: additionalData object in Accounts array RawEntity

userPrincipalName.description: userPrincipalName of Manager in Accounts array

mail.description: mail of Manager in Accounts array

id.description: Userid of Manager in Accounts array

AssignedRoles.description: AssignedRoles of user in Accounts array

asn.description: asn in GeoData object in IPs array

carrier.description: carrier in GeoData object in IPs array

city.description: city in GeoData object in IPs array

cityCf.description: cityCf in GeoData object in IPs array

continent.description: continent in GeoData object in IPs array

country.description: country in GeoData object in IPs array

countryCf.description: countryCf in GeoData object in IPs array

ipAddr.description: IP Address in GeoData object in IPs array

ipRoutingType.description: ipRoutingType in GeoData object in IPs array

latitude.description: latitude in GeoData object in IPs array

longitude.description: longitude in GeoData object in IPs array

organization.description: organization in GeoData object in IPs array

organizationType.description: organizationType in GeoData object in IPs array

region.description: region in GeoData object in IPs array

state.description: state in GeoData object in IPs array

stateCf.description: stateCf in GeoData object in IPs array

stateCode.description: stateCode in GeoData object in IPs array

address.description: address in RawEntity object in IPs array

friendlyName.description: friendlyName in RawEntity object in IPs array

post.description: Sentinel Triage AssistanT Module for determining if user entities are out of the office.

AddIncidentComments.description: Add Comments to Microsoft Sentinel Incident

AllUsersInOffice.description: true if All users are in the office

AllUsersOutOfOffice.description: true if All users are out of the office

ExternalMessage.description: External Out of Office message in DetailedResults array

InternalMessage.description: Internal Out of Office message in DetailedResults array

OOFStatus.description: Out of Office status in DetailedResults array

UsersInOffice.description: Count of Users In the Office

UsersOutOfOffice.description: Count of Users Out of the Office

UsersUnknown.description: Count of Users with unknown Out of Office status

post.description: Sentinel Triage AssistanT Module for determining if incident entities are in Threat Intelligence.

AddIncidentComments.description: Add Comments to Microsoft Sentinel Incident

CheckDomains.description: Check Domain entities against Threat Intel

CheckFileHashes.description: Check FileHash entities against Threat Intel

CheckIPs.description: Check IP entities against Threat Intel

CheckURLs.description: Check URL entities against Threat Intel

LookbackInDays.description: Number of days to lookback in Threat Intel for matches

AnyTIFound.description: true if any Threat Intelligence is found

TIType.description: Threat Intel type in DetailedResults array

TIData.description: Threat Intel Data in DetailedResults array

SourceSystem.description: Threat Intel SourceSystem in DetailedResults array

Description.description: Threat Intel Description in DetailedResults array

DomainEntitiesWithTI.description: Count of Domain Entities with matching TI

DomainTIFound.description: true if TI found for any Domain Entities

FileHashEntitiesWithTI.description: Count of FileHash Entities with matching TI

FileHashTIFound.description: true if TI found for any FileHash Entities

IPEntitiesWithTI.description: Count of IP Entities with matching TI

IPTIFound.description: true if TI found for any IP Entities

URLEntitiesWithTI.description: Count of URL entities with matching TI

URLTIFound.description: true if TI found for any URL Entities

post.description: Sentinel Triage AssistanT Module for determining if entities have recent related alerts in Sentinel.

AddIncidentComments.description: Add Comments to Microsoft Sentinel Incident

CheckAccounts.description: Check Account entities against recent alerts

CheckHosts.description: Check Host entities against recent alerts

CheckIPs.description: Check IP entities against recent alerts

LookbackInDays.description: Number of days to lookback in recent alerts for matches

HighestSeverityAlert.description: The severity of the highest severity alert found

RelatedAccountAlertsCount.description: Count of Related Alerts found for Account Entities

RelatedAccountAlertsFound.description: true if any Related Alerts found for Account Entities

RelatedAlertsCount.description: Count of all Related Alerts found

RelatedAlertsFound.description: true if any Related Alerts found

RelatedHostAlertsCount.description: Count of Related Alerts found for Host Entities

RelatedHostAlertsFound.description: true if any Related Alerts found for Host Entities

RelatedIPAlertsCount.description: Count of Related Alerts found for IP Entities

RelatedIPAlertsFound.description: true if any Related Alerts found for IP Entities

post.description: Sentinel Triage AssistanT Module for determining if incident entities are on a Sentinel watchlist.

AddIncidentComments.description: Add Comments to Microsoft Sentinel Incident

WatchlistKey.description: Enter the column name from the watchlist to match to the entity data

WatchlistKeyDataType.description: Enter the format of the data in the WatchlistKey column.  UPN, IP or CIDR.

WatchlistName.description: Name of the Microsoft Sentinel watchlist

OnWatchlist.description: true if Entity on watchlist in DetailedResults array

EntitiesAnalyzedCount.description: Count of Entities Analyzed against watchlist

EntitiesOnWatchlist.description: true if any Entities are on the Watchlist

post.description: Sentinel Triage AssistanT Module for running custom KQL queries against Microsoft Sentinel or Microsoft 365 Security.

AddIncidentComments.description: Add Comments to Microsoft Sentinel Incident

KQLQuery.description: Enter the KQL query you want to execute

LookbackInDays.description: Enter the number of days you want to lookback in the KQL Data

RunQueryAgainst.description: Run the KQL Query against Microsoft Sentinel or Microsoft 365 Security

ResultsFound.description: true if any results are found

post.description: Sentinel Triage AssistanT Module for determining if user entities have corresponding investigation priorities in Sentinel UEBA.

AddIncidentComments.description: Add Comments to Microsoft Sentinel Incident

LookbackInDays.description: Duration in days to lookback for UEBA Investigation Priorities

AllEntityEventCount.description: Total count of all matching Investigation Priorities

AllEntityInvestigationPriorityAverage.description: Average priority of all matching Investigation Priorities

AllEntityInvestigationPriorityMax.description: Maximum priority of all matching Investigation Priorities

AllEntityInvestigationPrioritySum.description: Sum of priority of all matching Investigation Priorities

InvestigationPrioritySum.description: Sum of Investigation Priority by user in DetailedResults array

InvestigationPriorityAverage.description: Average Investigation Priority by user in DetailedResults array

InvestigationPriorityMax.description: Max Investigation Priority by user in DetailedResults array

EventCount.description: Count of Investigation Priorities by user in DetailedResults array

InvestigationPrioritiesFound.description: true if any matching Investigation Priorities are found

post.description: Sentinel Triage AssistanT Module for determining if user entities have related Azure Active Directory risk data.

AddIncidentComments.description: Add Comments to Microsoft Sentinel Incident

LookbackInDays.description: Duration in days to lookback for AAD Risk data

FailedMFATotalCount.description: Sum of all matching failed MFA attempts

HighestRiskLevel.description: Highest risk level found for all the entities

MFAFraudTotalCount.description: Sum of all matching fraudulant MFA attempts

UserFailedMFACount.description: UserFailedMFACount by user in DetailedResults array

UserMFAFraudCount.description: UserMFAFraudCount by user in DetailedResults array

UserRiskLevel.description: UserRiskLevel by user in DetailedResults array

post.description: Sentinel Triage AssistanT Module for gaining insights into File entities.

AddIncidentComments.description: Add Comments to Microsoft Sentinel Incident

post.description: Sentinel Triage AssistanT Module for getting MDE insights into device entities.

AddIncidentComments.description: Add Comments to Microsoft Sentinel Incident

LookbackInDays.description: Enter the number of days you want to lookback in MDE data

post.summary: Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps Module
post.description: Sentinel Triage AssistanT Module for determining if user entities have investigation priorities in Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps.

AddIncidentComments.description: Add Comments to Microsoft Sentinel Incident

Entities.description: Click here and select the Entities object from the Dynamic content menu

IncidentARMId.description: Click here and select the Incident ARM ID object from the Dynamic content menu

WorkspaceId.description: Click here and select the Workspace ID object from the Dynamic content menu

body.Error: STAT Module not found in the coordinator.  Either the module is invalid or the coordinator needs to be updated.
